mapper.select:
SELECT a.RES_SEQ, a.ITEM_ID, a.ITEM_GUBUN, dbo.FN_TIMESPLIT(a.RES_STARTTIME) resStarttime , dbo.FN_TIMESPLIT(dbo.FN_UPSTIMEDOWN(a.RES_ENDTIME)) resEndtime, CONVERT (DATE, a.RES_STARTDAY) resStartday, CONVERT (DATE, a.RES_ENDDAY) resEndday, b.EMPNAME, b.EMPHANDPHONE, b.EMPJIKW, b.EMPMAIL, b.EMPNO, a.RES_TITLE, CASE a.ITEM_GUBUN WHEN 'ITEM_GUBUN_2' THEN (SELECT MEETING_NAME FROM TB_MEETING_ROOM B WHERE b.MEETING_ID = a.ITEM_ID ) ELSE (SELECT SEAT_NAME FROM TB_SEATINFO C WHERE c.SEAT_ID = a.ITEM_ID ) END as ITEM_NAME FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION a , TB_EMPINFO b WHERE a.USER_ID = b.EMPID AND a.SEND_MESSAGE = 'Y'
AND a.RES_STARTDAY = convert(varchar(8), dateadd(day, 1, GETDATE()) , 112) AND a.RES_STARTTIME = REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), getdate(), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND a.ITEM_GUBUN = 'ITEM_GUBUN_1' AND a.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN IN('PROCESS_GUBUN_2', 'PROCESS_GUBUN_4')
AND a.RES_STARTDAY = convert(varchar(8), GETDATE() , 112) AND a.RES_STARTTIME = REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), dateadd(MI, 10, getdate()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND a.ITEM_GUBUN = 'ITEM_GUBUN_1' AND a.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN IN('PROCESS_GUBUN_2', 'PROCESS_GUBUN_4') AND ( CAST( REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), ISNULL( a.IN_TIME, GETDATE()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AS INT) - CAST( a.RES_STARTTIME AS INT) ) > 10
AND a.RES_STARTDAY = convert(varchar(8), GETDATE() , 112) AND a.RES_STARTTIME = REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), dateadd(MI, 20, getdate()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND a.ITEM_GUBUN = 'ITEM_GUBUN_1' AND a.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN IN('PROCESS_GUBUN_2', 'PROCESS_GUBUN_4')

SELECT TOP 1 b.SEAT_NAME, d.CENTER_NM, c.FLOOR_NAME, a.IN_TIME, a.OT_TIME FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION a, TB_SEATINFO b, TB_FLOORINFO c, TB_CENTERINFO d WHERE a.ITEM_ID = b.SEAT_ID AND b.CENTER_ID = d.CENTER_ID AND b.FLOOR_SEQ = c.FLOOR_SEQ AND b.SEAT_GUBUN = 'SEAT_GUBUN_1' AND a.ITEM_GUBUN = 'ITEM_GUBUN_2' AND a.RES_STARTDAY = convert(varchar(8), getdate(), 112) AND a.USER_ID = #{empNo} ORDER BY RES_SEQ desc

SELECT CONCAT( YEAR, MONTH) as calenderTitle, CONCAT(YEAR , '-', MONTH, ' 월') as calenderTitleTxt FROM TB_CALENDER WHERE DATES BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(8), DATEADD(day, -3, getdate()), 112) AND CONVERT(varchar(8), DATEADD(month, 3, getdate()), 112) GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ORDER BY YEAR ASC , month ASC

SELECT DISTINCT X.DATES, X.weekTxt , X.passDate , STUFF( (SELECT ',' + cast( CONCAT( b.MEETING_NAME,':', dbo.FN_SWCRESTATE( b.MEETING_ID, DATES)) as VARCHAR(max)) FROM TB_CALENDER a , (SELECT MEETING_ID, MEETING_NAME, MEETING_ORDER FROM TB_MEETING_ROOM WHERE FLOOR_SEQ = #{floorSeq}) b WHERE SUBSTRING(dates, 1, 6) = #{searchCalenderTitle} AND DATES = X.DATES GROUP BY DATES , MEETING_NAME, MEETING_ID, MEETING_ORDER ORDER BY MEETING_ORDER ASC FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '') resState FROM ( SELECT DATES, CASE WHEN DATES > CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS passDate ,DATEPART(WEEKDAY, CONVERT (DATE, DATES)) weekTxt FROM TB_CALENDER a WHERE SUBSTRING(dates, 1, 6) = #{searchCalenderTitle} GROUP BY DATES ) X GROUP BY X.DATES, X.weekTxt, X.passDate ORDER BY X.DATES ASC

SELECT c.RES_TITLE, c.RES_STARTDAY, dbo.FN_TIMESPLIT(c.RES_STARTTIME) resStartTimeT , dbo.FN_TIMESPLIT(dbo.FN_UPSTIMEDOWN(c.RES_ENDTIME)) resEndTimeT , c.RES_STARTTIME, c.RES_ENDTIME, TA.MEETING_ID, c.RES_ATTENDLIST, CASE WHEN (TA.RES_SEQ > 0) THEN dbo.FN_ATTENTLIST(c.RES_ATTENDLIST) ELSE '' END attendListTxt, TA.MEETING_USEYN, TA.RES_SEQ , TA.TIME_SEQ, TA.MEETING_NAME , TA.SWC_TIME, TA.CENTER_ID, TA.MEETING_CONFIRMGUBUN, TA.MEETING_EQUPGUBUN, CASE WHEN (TA.RES_SEQ > 0) THEN ( SELECT CONCAT ( EMPNAME, '|', DEPTNAME) FROM TB_EMPINFO WHERE EMPNO = c.USER_ID ) ELSE '' END EMPNAME, c.IN_TIME, c.OT_TIME, TA.MEETING_ORDER, TA.FLOOR_INFO, ISNULL( TA.RES_REQDAY, 0) RES_REQDAY, TA.ROOM_TYPE FROM ( SELECT b.MEETING_USEYN, a.RES_SEQ , a.TIME_SEQ, b.MEETING_NAME , a.SWC_TIME, a.CENTER_ID, b.MEETING_ID, b.ROOM_TYPE, b.MEETING_CONFIRMGUBUN, b.MEETING_EQUPGUBUN, b.MEETING_ORDER, cast(replace( c.FLOOR_INFO, 'CENTER_FLOOR_', '') as int) FLOOR_INFO, b.RES_REQDAY FROM TB_SWCTIME a, TB_MEETING_ROOM b, TB_FLOORINFO c WHERE a.ITEM_ID = b.MEETING_ID
AND b.ROOM_TYPE IN ('SWC_GUBUN_1','SWC_GUBUN_2','SWC_GUBUN_3')
AND b.ROOM_TYPE IN ('SWC_GUBUN_1','SWC_GUBUN_2')
AND b.ROOM_TYPE IN ('SWC_GUBUN_1','SWC_GUBUN_2','SWC_GUBUN_3') AND b.FLOOR_SEQ = c.FLOOR_SEQ
AND a.MEETING_ID= #{params.searchMeetingid} AND a.SWC_TIME BETWEEN REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), DATEADD(minute, -30, GETDATE()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 114), 1,5), ':','')
AND a.SWC_TIME BETWEEN REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), DATEADD(minute, -30, GETDATE()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), DATEADD(minute, 30, GETDATE()), 114), 1,5), ':','')
AND a.SWC_TIME BETWEEN REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), DATEADD(minute, -30, GETDATE()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 114), 1,5), ':','')
AND a.SWC_RESDAY = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)
AND b.MEETING_USEYN ='Y' and b.MEETING_MAINVIEW = 'Y'
AND b.CENTER_ID = #{params.centerId}
AND b.MEETING_ID = #{params.meetingId}
AND b.FLOOR_SEQ IN ( SELECT strVALUE FROM dbo.UF_SPLICT( ( SELECT COM_PLAY_FLOOR FROM TB_COMPANYINFO WHERE COM_CODE = #{params.comCode}) , ',') )
) TA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SWCRESERVATION AS c ON TA.RES_SEQ = c.RES_SEQ ORDER BY TA.CENTER_ID ASC, TA.FLOOR_INFO asc, TA.MEETING_ORDER ASC

SELECT a.RES_SEQ , a.CANCEL_REASON , dbo.FN_DETAILCODENM(RESERVATION_REASON) AS reservationReason , a.RESERVATION_REASON_DETAIL , CASE a.COWORKER_YN WHEN '1' THEN CASE a.PROXY_YN WHEN 'P' THEN (SELECT EMPNAME FROM TB_EMPINFO WHERE EMPNO =a.proxy_user_id) ELSE (SELECT EMPNAME FROM TB_EMPINFO WHERE EMPNO = a.USER_ID) END ELSE a.OUT_USER_NM END userName, a.MOB_TEL_NO FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION a WHERE RES_SEQ = #{resSeq}

SELECT XX.year, XX.month, (XX.cnt*XX.roomRealCnt) AS totalSeat, XX.resCount, XX.roomInCount, ROUND(CASE XX.resCount WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((TO_NUMBER(XX.resCount)/(TO_NUMBER(XX.cnt)* TO_NUMBER(XX.roomRealCnt))) * 100) END, 2) AS per, XX.resCancel , ROUND(CASE XX.resCancel WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE ( ( TO_NUMBER(XX.resCancel) / TO_NUMBER(XX.regCount) ) * 100 ) END, 2) AS per1, ((XX.cnt*XX.roomRealCnt) - XX.resCount) AS remindSeat FROM ( SELECT X.year, X.month, X.roomInCount, X.resCount, X.resCancel, X.regCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_meeting_room WHERE Use_YN = 'Y' and ROOM_TYPE in ('swc_gubun_1', 'swc_gubun_3')) AS roomRealCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CALENDER f WHERE f.YEAR = X.year AND f.MONTH = X.month AND f.DATES between #{searchStartDay} and #{searchEndDay} ) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT a.year, a.month, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(d.ATT_SEQ),0) FROM TB_ATTENDANCE d , tb_meeting_room c, TB_SWCRESERVATION b WHERE a.year = SUBSTR(d.RES_DAY,0,4) AND a.MONTH = SUBSTR(d.RES_DAY,5,2) AND d.ROOM_INTIME IS NOT NULL AND c.MEETING_ID = b.MEETING_ID and c.ROOM_TYPE in ('swc_gubun_1', 'swc_gubun_3') and d.RES_SEQ = b.RES_SEQ ) AS roomInCount, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(XX.RES_SEQ),0) FROM ( SELECT E.RES_SEQ, e.swc_resday FROM TB_SWCTIME e , tb_meeting_room c WHERE e.MEETING_ID = c.MEETING_ID and c.ROOM_TYPE in ('swc_gubun_1', 'swc_gubun_3') AND e.RES_SEQ ! =0 GROUP BY E.RES_SEQ, E.swc_resday ) XX WHERE a.year = SUBSTR(XX.swc_resday,0,4) AND a.MONTH = SUBSTR(XX.swc_resday,5,2) )AS resCount, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(b.RES_SEQ),0) FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION b , tb_meeting_room c where a.year = SUBSTR(to_char(b.REG_DATE,'yyyyMMdd'),0,4) AND a.MONTH = SUBSTR(to_char(b.REG_DATE,'yyyyMMdd'),5,2) AND b.MEETING_ID = c.MEETING_ID and c.ROOM_TYPE in ('swc_gubun_1', 'swc_gubun_3') AND (b.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN = 'resProcess06' or b.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN = 'resProcess05') ) AS resCancel, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(RES_SEQ),0) FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION b , tb_meeting_room c WHERE b.MEETING_ID = c.MEETING_ID and c.ROOM_TYPE in ('swc_gubun_1', 'swc_gubun_3') AND a.year = SUBSTR(to_char(b.REG_DATE,'yyyyMMdd'),0,4) AND a.MONTH = SUBSTR(to_char(b.REG_DATE,'yyyyMMdd'),5,2) ) AS regCount FROM TB_CALENDER a WHERE a.DATES between #{searchStartDay} and #{searchEndDay} GROUP BY a.year, a.month ORDER BY a.month ASC ) X ) XX

SELECT XX.year, XX.month, (XX.cnt*XX.roomRealCnt) AS totalSeat, XX.resCount, XX.roomInCount, ROUND(CASE XX.resCount WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((CAST(XX.resCount AS INT)/(CAST(XX.cnt AS INT)* CAST(XX.roomRealCnt AS INT))) * 100) END, 2) AS per, XX.resCancel , ROUND(CASE XX.resCancel WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE ( ( CAST(XX.resCancel AS INT) / CAST(XX.regCount AS INT) ) * 100 ) END, 2) AS per1, ((XX.cnt*XX.roomRealCnt) - XX.resCount) AS remindSeat FROM ( SELECT X.year, X.month, X.roomInCount, X.resCount, X.resCancel, X.regCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEETING_ROOM WHERE Use_YN = 'Y' and ROOM_TYPE = 'swc_gubun_3') AS roomRealCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CALENDER f WHERE f.YEAR = X.year AND f.MONTH = X.month AND f.DATES BETWEEN #{searchStartDay} AND #{searchEndDay} ) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT a.year, a.month, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(d.ATT_SEQ),0) FROM TB_ATTENDANCE d , tb_meeting_room c, TB_SWCRESERVATION b WHERE a.year = SUBSTRING(d.RES_DAY,0,4) AND a.MONTH = SUBSTRING(d.RES_DAY,5,2) AND d.ROOM_INTIME IS NOT NULL AND c.MEETING_ID = b.MEETING_ID and c.ROOM_TYPE = 'swc_gubun_3' and d.RES_SEQ = b.RES_SEQ ) AS roomInCount, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(XX.RES_SEQ),0) FROM ( SELECT E.RES_SEQ, e.swc_resday FROM TB_SWCTIME e , TB_MEETING_ROOM c WHERE e.MEETING_ID = c.MEETING_ID and c.ROOM_TYPE = 'swc_gubun_3' AND e.RES_SEQ ! =0 GROUP BY E.RES_SEQ, E.swc_resday ) XX WHERE a.year = SUBSTRING(XX.swc_resday,0,4) AND a.MONTH = SUBSTRING(XX.swc_resday,5,2) )AS resCount, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(b.RES_SEQ),0) FROM tb_swcreservation b , tb_meeting_room c WHERE a.year = SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), b.REG_DATE, 112),1,4) AND a.MONTH = SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), b.REG_DATE, 112),5,2) AND b.MEETING_ID = c.MEETING_ID and c.ROOM_TYPE = 'swc_gubun_3' AND (b.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN = 'resProcess06' or b.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN = 'resProcess05') ) AS resCancel, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(RES_SEQ),0) FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION b , TB_MEETING_ROOM c WHERE b.MEETING_ID = c.MEETING_ID and c.ROOM_TYPE = 'swc_gubun_3' AND a.year = SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), b.REG_DATE, 112),1,4) AND a.MONTH = SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), b.REG_DATE, 112),5,2)
) AS regCount FROM TB_CALENDER a WHERE a.DATES BETWEEN #{searchStartDay} AND #{searchEndDay} GROUP BY a.YEAR, a.MONTH ORDER BY a.MONTH ASC ) X ) XX

SELECT c.ORG_NAME, c.ORG_PARENT_ID, (SELECT COUNT(a.RES_SEQ) FROM TB_MEETING_ROOM b WHERE a.MEETING_ID = b.MEETING_ID AND b.ROOM_TYPE IN ('swc_gubun_1','swc_gubun_3') ) AS woorkCnt, (SELECT COUNT(a.RES_SEQ) FROM TB_MEETING_ROOM b WHERE a.MEETING_ID = b.MEETING_ID AND b.ROOM_TYPE = 'swc_gubun_3' ) AS meetingCnt FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION a, TB_ORGINFO c, TB_EMPINFO d, TB_SWCTIME e WHERE a.PROXY_USER_ID = d.USER_ID AND d.USER_ID = c.CP_DEPT AND A.RES_SEQ = E.RES_SEQ AND e.SWC_RESDAY between #{searchStartDay} and #{searchEndDay} AND a.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN IN ('resProcess02','resProcess03') GROUP BY c.ORG_NAME, c.ORG_PARENT_ID, a.MEETING_ID, c.ORG_ODR, c.CP_DEPT ORDER BY ORG_ODR asc, ORG_PARENT_ID asc, CP_DEPT asc, ORG_NAME asc

SELECT f.GRADE_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(a.RES_SEQ) FROM TB_MEETING_ROOM b WHERE a.MEETING_ID = b.MEETING_ID AND b.ROOM_TYPE IN ('swc_gubun_1','swc_gubun_3') ) AS workCnt, (SELECT COUNT(a.RES_SEQ) FROM TB_MEETING_ROOM b WHERE a.MEETING_ID = b.MEETING_ID AND b.ROOM_TYPE = 'swc_gubun_3' ) AS meetingCnt FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION a, TB_ORGINFO c, TB_EMPINFO d, TB_SWCTIME e WHERE a.PROXY_USER_ID = d.USER_ID AND A.RES_SEQ = E.RES_SEQ AND e.SWC_RESDAY between #{searchStartDay} and #{searchEndDay} AND a.RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN IN ('resProcess02','resProcess03') GROUP BY c.ORG_NAME, c.ORG_PARENT_ID, a.MEETING_ID, c.ORG_ODR, c.CP_DEPT ORDER BY GRADE_NAME ASC

SELECT a.USER_ID, a.RES_ATTENDLIST, a.RES_TITLE, dbo.FN_TIMESPLIT(a.RES_STARTTIME) resStarttime , a.RES_GUBUN, dbo.FN_TIMESPLIT(dbo.FN_UPSTIMEDOWN(a.RES_ENDTIME)) resEndtime, CONVERT(DATE, a.RES_STARTDAY) resStartday, CASE WHEN (a.RES_GUBUN = 'SWC_GUBUN_2') THEN (SELECT b.TERMINAL_TEL FROM TB_MEETING_ROOM b WHERE b.MEETING_ID = a.MEETING_ID) ELSE '' END meetingTel FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION a WHERE RES_STARTDAY =CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) AND RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN IN ('PROCESS_GUBUN_1','PROCESS_GUBUN_2', 'PROCESS_GUBUN_4')
SELECT dbo.FN_TENNPLAYINFO(#{itemId}, #{itemGubun}, #{resStartday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resStarttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resEndtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId}) as tenn
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SWCRESERVATION SET res_reply_date = GETDATE() WHERE RES_SEQ = #{resSeq}
update TB_SWCRESERVATION set RES_STARTDAY = #{resStartday}, RES_ENDDAY = #{resEndday} where RES_SEQ = #{resSeq}

UPDATE TB_SWCRESERVATION SET RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN = 'PROCESS_GUBUN_6', CANCEL_CODE = 'CANCEL_CODE_3', CANCEL_REASON = '10분 이후 입실 없음' WHERE RES_SEQ IN ( SELECT b.RES_SEQ FROM TB_SWCTIME a, TB_SWCRESERVATION b WHERE a.RES_SEQ = b.RES_SEQ AND a.SWC_RESDAY = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) AND SWC_TIME BETWEEN REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), DATEADD(minute, -29, GETDATE()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND ( CAST( REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), ISNULL( b.IN_TIME, GETDATE()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AS INT) - CAST( b.RES_STARTTIME AS INT) ) > 10 AND b.ITEM_GUBUN = 'ITEM_GUBUN_1' ); UPDATE tb_swctime SET RES_SEQ = 0, APPRIVAL ='N' WHERE RES_SEQ in ( SELECT b.RES_SEQ FROM TB_SWCTIME a, TB_SWCRESERVATION b WHERE a.RES_SEQ = b.RES_SEQ AND a.SWC_RESDAY = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) AND SWC_TIME BETWEEN REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), DATEADD(minute, -29, GETDATE()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 114), 1,5), ':','') AND ( CAST( REPLACE(SUBSTRING(CONVERT (VARCHAR(12), ISNULL( b.IN_TIME, GETDATE()), 114), 1,5), ':','') AS INT) - CAST( b.RES_STARTTIME AS INT) ) > 10 AND b.ITEM_GUBUN = 'ITEM_GUBUN_1' ) ;
UPDATE TB_SWCTIME SET RES_SEQ = 0 WHERE RES_SEQ = #{resSeq};
UPDATE TB_SWCRESERVATION SET RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN = 'PROCESS_GUBUN_8' WHERE RES_SEQ = #{resSeq}

choose.when: UPDATE TB_SWCRESERVATION SET IN_TIME = GETDATE() WHERE RES_SEQ = #{resSeq}
choose.otherwise: UPDATE TB_SWCRESERVATION SET OT_TIME = GETDATE() WHERE RES_SEQ = #{resSeq}
